entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 09:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 54 %

Dewpoint: -30.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
